actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Salary Act of 1967 by removing Members of Congress from the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

summary.text: Repeals the authority of the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries to review the rates of pay of Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Salary Act of 1967 by removing Members of Congress from the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.
